meanings.definition: A type of antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed methicillins to help fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: The hospital keeps a stock of methicillins for treating various bacterial illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the methicillins, knowing they would be defeated soon.
meanings.sent4: The methicillins acted like brave soldiers, battling the bacterial invaders in the body.
meanings.sent5: The methicillins were like tiny warriors, fighting off the enemy bacteria with precision.
